## Data Science Training
:::: {layout-ncol=2 text-align=center}
::: {#first-column}

[Fred Hutch Courses & Community](https://ocdo.fredhutch.org/dasl)

We support a variety of data science training, education, community building and self-service resources that support data science education in a number of scientific areas that are broadly applicable. 

:::

::: {#second-column}
[Broad Data Science Training](https://hutchdatascience.org/DaSL_Collection/)

Our Fred Hutch DaSL Research Affiliate team generates a wide variety of broadly relevant data science education materials that are available through a variety of self-service and event-based mechanisms. Check out their comprehensive collection of resources. 
:::
::::


## Peer to Peer Support
:::: {layout-ncol=2 text-align=center}
::: {#first-column}

[Data House Calls](programs/dhc.qmd)



Data House Calls are a self-service way to leverage our staff's expertise to help you get where you want to go with your data science skills.  

![](img/DaSLHouseCalls-lucy.png){width=50%}

:::

::: {#second-column}
[FH Data Slack](https://join.slack.com/t/fhdata/signup)


Find our current events, peer to peer support, and other data oriented resources in the Fred Hutch Data Slack workspace which is open to anyone in the Fred Hutch Cancer Consortium.  


![](img/fh-data.png){width=50%}
:::
::::

## Self-Service Tools and Documentation 
:::: {layout-ncol=2 text-align=center}
::: {#first-column}

[WILDS](programs/wilds.qmd)



We make our open source resources for tooling to support **W**orkflows **I**ntegrating **L**arge **D**ata and **S**oftware (WILDS), available for our clinical and research communities at Fred Hutch through our GitHub organization. 

![](img/WILDS_V3 Square.png){width=50%}

:::



::: {#second-column}

[Biomedical Data Science Wiki](programs/sciwiki.qmd)



The Fred Hutch Cancer Center's Biomedical Data Science Wiki is a curated knowledgebase for biomedical data science and research computing best practices, how-to's and other documentation. 

![](img/wiki.jpg){width=50%}
:::

::::

## Newsletters 

:::: {layout-ncol=2 text-align=center}
::: {#first-column}

[Translational "Data Noon" Community Calls and Newsletters](https://centernet.fredhutch.org/u/data-science-lab/engineering.html#data_noon)

Our Data Product Management team provides regular connection, information and visibility into high priority data related projects at the Fred Hutch through regular Community Calls and newsletters.  If you're a Fred Hutch staff member and would like to receive our newsletter or join our calls, find out more in [Centernet](https://centernet.fredhutch.org/u/data-science-lab/engineering.html#data_noon). 

![](img/data_noon.png){width=50%}

:::

::: {#second-column}

[Monday Morning Data Science](https://fhdata.substack.com/)


Monday Morning Data Science is our weekly newsletter with updates from the Lab, announcements about events happening at Fred Hutch and beyond, and data science related content our staff contribute!  

![](img/substack.png){width=50%}
:::
::::




### Past [Openscapes](programs/openscapes.html) Partnerships
We are proud to have partnered with Openscapes to bring the [Openscapes Champions Cohort Program to Fred Hutch in 2024 and 2025](programs/openscapes.html). Openscapes Champions is a mentorship program for biomedical data staff centered around collaborative coding and open science.
